statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x + 4 , 9 \, x^{3} + 13 \, x^{2} + 17 \, x - 17 , 17 \, x^{3} + 22 \, x^{2} + 29 \, x - 30 , -6 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 2 \, x + 5 , -3 \, x^{3} + 11 \, x^{2} + 13 \, x - 7\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
